content:
Who is going to participate Connectathon 28?
I do.

It would be nice to have a JavaScript session. What do you think?

Let's choose a time. I would like to have a session at 7:00 am EDT before other sessions will start.
Please react with :thumbs_up: if it works for you or feels free to propose another time.

I have created a connectathon event https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hlsfh_202109/CommunityBoard/topic/575574
Wed. Sep 15, 2021time 07:00 am
